mapper.select: select a.aid,a.content,a.userid,a.adddate from artcomment a where a.delflg=0 and a.aid=#{aid}
mapper.update: update artcomment set update = now(),delflg=1 where acid = #{acid}
mapper.insert: insert into artcomment (aid, content, userid, adddate, upddate, delflg) values (#{aid},#{content},'1',now(),now(),'0')
